p.i: A sling that appears to be made of rubbery, congealed green goo.

description.p: Benefit You shoot magical bullets of goo that dissolve armor on impact, dealing standard sling bullet damage.

Curse The sling holds 10 bullets that cannot be recovered once fired. To resupply, you must defeat a slime, ooze, royal jelly, or gelatinous cube and allow the sling to drink the goo. Slimefolk cannot recharge.
